title: Leftover Girl
description: How far will she go to learn what happened to her parents?At fifteen, Jes has adjusted to moving without notice and never fitting in. Her adoptive parents insist she keep her past a secret from everyone they meet. Should she feel bad about the lies? It's not like Jes remembers the night they found her barefoot in the snow. Plus, they cared enough to keep her out of a foster home. If only they could keep her from feeling alone.After starting over in the latest town, she turns to the only person who understands her. His power should scare Jes, but she's determined to learn why he seems so familiar.As Jes will learn, truth comes at a cost. Could he unravel the mystery of her past?Leftover Girl starts an exciting new coming-of-age series that will take one girl from high school to the stars. Simply written, these books are heavy on dialogue with twists you won't see coming, family secrets, and powers.Think you know who Jes really is? Keep reading...
author: C.C. Bolick
